venue.name: Student Organization Center at Hilles, Harvard University (Radcliffe Quadrangle)

item.description: The Harvard Interfaith Collaborative is hosting a food packaging event on Sunday, November 20th, a follow-up to the enormous success of their similar event in September when volunteers packed 9,110 nutritious meals for food-insecure children. For this November event, the organizers hope to double that number by packaging 20,000 meals to distribute during Thanksgiving week through the Kids Care program. The event will include refreshments and facilitated dialogue on what motivates people of different faith and philosophical convictions to engage in service work. Since this is a public event, I am encouraging members of the Boston Atheists to attend and contribute to the good works. More information at http://www.facebook.c....
item.name: Thanksgiving Meal-Packing Service Project!
